content: For release on delivery  11:00 a.m. EST (5:00 p.m. CET)  December 17, 2012      Dollar Funding and Global Banks         Remarks by     Jeremy C. Stein     Member     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at the     Global Research Forum, International Finance and Macroecomomics     Sponsored by the European Central Bank     Frankfurt am Main, Germany                 December 17, 2012
